page.title: 05FARMS AT PURTON STOKE
page.content: Farms around Purton Stoke are mostly {dairy farms.}The fields are for pasture,hay and silage.Dairy farmers have milk quotas imposed by the E.E.C. On Woodwards Bridge farm they raise {calves}for beef.They have also got a Jersey cow for butter and cream.They eat the meat from their own cows.Mr Scott is an organic farmer .He does not believe in artificial fertilizers. They are also rearing two cinnamon coloured pigs and keep some poultry including geese and ducks and sell the eggs. They grow their own vegetables.
